dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Intruder... why do you tread on the obsidian lands of Granite?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking power. Will you aid me or fall before me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are bold, mortal. Power comes at a cost.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then name your price, and we shall see if it is within my reach.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The price is your submission to the ancient stones.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will never submit. Prepare to be shattered!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then prepare to face the wrath of the primordial!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If submission brings power, then I shall bend.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. The power of the stones is yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No cost is too great for me! Face your end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you misunderstand your place.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We shall see whose place is misunderstood.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough talk. Feel the strength of the earth!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there's wisdom in your words. Let's talk terms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There is no talking. Only the ancient will decide.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Aid me, and I will elevate you beyond your primordial essence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You dare to presume you can elevate the primordial?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Yes, with my magic, anything is possible.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps I overestimated. Let me reconsider.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your hesitation marks you as weak. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge of the ancients. Guide me or be destroyed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is not for the weak. Prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Challenge accepted. Name your trial.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Face the molten depths and return unscathed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall return victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Many have tried, none have succeeded. Prove me wrong.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If it means power, I shall endure anything.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then descend, and let the flames judge you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My power is proof enough. Bow before my might.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Boastful words. The strength of stone shall test them.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no test. Let's end this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then perish in the shadow of the ancient!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Wisdom lies in patience. Show me your secrets.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Patience is no match for the ancients. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Knowledge demands respect, not brute force.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect is earned through trial. Do you accept?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept. Lead the way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The path is harsh. Survive, and we shall speak again.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No. I demand the knowledge now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Demanding will get you nothing but ruin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your presence here is an affront to the darkness. Leave, or be crushed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The stones do not tremble before shadows.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I shall shatter them with my power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your power is insignificant against the ancient might.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let's see who uproots whom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare for your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Why waste time fighting? Join me instead.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join a creature of shadows? Absurd!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a chance to join the winning side.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allegiance with darkness is a hollow offer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Hollow or not, it is your only option.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I'd rather be shattered than serve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Consider it a temporary alliance, then.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your persistence is futile. Leave here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Darkness will consume you if you resist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The ancient stone has withstood greater threats than you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then be destroyed as they were.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Face the fate of the fallen!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps you underestimate the power of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: And you overestimate it. Depart.
